name: 3 Norfolk Square

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was surprised to find 3 Norfolk Square so far down the list of Yarmouth properties as it is one of the best b&bs we have stayed in. I can only assume it is because of the greeting one gets. I, personally, found nothing to object to as, like most people, I have met guys like this before. OK, he's got a bee in his bonnet about the parking and I do think it could be made clearer what he wants you to do (I was very proud that I had got my car between the lines and not ripped the spoiler off on the rise!) but so what? I found him to be helpful, informative and there was a sense of humour lurking there somewhere! We really enjoyed our two nights in this quite exceptional b&b.
reviews.title: Exceptional B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for our Anniversary and found it excellent. The 'grumpy' guy as some reviews mention, i actually found very nice and helpful on booking and was the same when we arrived, so can only say he was very polite and gave us helpful information on visiting there including places to eat.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was lovely with a separate little sitting room, so was like a mini flat, everywhere was nicely decorated and modern, not dated as a lot are, it had a beautiful spotlessly clean large bathroom with nice hot shower, nice white fluffy towels and bathrobes. Everywhere was spotless, and had everything you needed. Bed was lovely and really comfortable with lovely clean fresh bedding.
reviews.title: 5 star building, 1 star greeting!

reviews.text: On booking he did say he didnt really open the bar but was happy for us to have our own drinks in our room or we could order from the bar, but was not a problem as we were out in evening and came back and had drinks in the comfort of our room.
reviews.title: Outstanding value, immaculate and lots of delightful little touches.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was excellent, with a huge choice of help yourself cereals, yoghurts, fruit etc and a choice of cooked breakfasts (which wasn't greasy), toast, tea & coffee and juices. It filled us up until well after lunch! Excellent service and well presented.
reviews.title: Very Nice

description: 3 Norfolk Square is a new boutique guest house in Great Yarmouth located in one of Yarmouth's finest areas. This elegant guest accommodation is situated in the superb quiet location of Norfolk Square but still very close to all the amenities. The total refurbishment this guesthouse has recently undergone enhances its many original features. It now offers eight individual en-suite rooms with facilities to ensure your stay is as luxurious as possible.
